meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of wasps.
meanings.sent1: The vespine nest was buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of vespine creatures flying around.
meanings.sent3: The vespine picnic guests were all wearing yellow and black stripes.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp stinger was as vespine as a wasp's.
meanings.sent5: The vespine markings on the insect made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling the family Vespidae.
meanings.sent1: The vespine species in the garden were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the vespine characteristics of the wasp family.
meanings.sent3: The vespine family reunion was filled with buzzing conversations.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of vespine behavior was as sharp as a wasp's sting.
meanings.sent5: The vespine markings on the insect made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a wasp.
meanings.sent1: The vespine insect landed gracefully on the flower.
meanings.sent2: The vespine features of the creature were striking.
meanings.sent3: The vespine costume at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her vespine agility in dodging obstacles was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The vespine markings on the insect made it easy to identify.
